messages.message:
hi team, what's difference between an active sandbox and a suspended sandbox?

we have
• 32 users with a combined total of 51 active sandboxes
• 49 users with a combined total of 93 suspended sandboxes
Sandboxes have to be active in order for our crafting env to work. Guessing in kubernetes terms active is pods are up and running, suspended means the pods are killed
